title: Vale to You, To Me the Heights
description:
LibriVox volunteers bring you 10 recordings of The Vale to You, To Me the Heights by Victor Hugo.
This was the Weekly Poetry project for November 28, 2021.
------
Hugo is considered to be one of the greatest and best-known French writers. Outside France, his most famous works are the novels Les Misérables, 1862, and The Hunchback of Notre-Dame (French: Notre-Dame de Paris), 1831. In France, Hugo is renowned for his poetry collections, such as Les Contemplations (The Contemplations) and La Légende des siècles (The Legend of the Ages). - Summary by Wikipedia
